nodes.bodyText: This part I'm not sure about as AnkiWeb only does 1.2. But if you're testing on API16 and it's working, I suppose that's the vital bit, and I don't think being more liberal in capability is a problem so long as it actually goes up to 1.2
That wasn't intended, debugging code that slipped through! It still works, but I'll revert. Likely not worth holding up the beta over
